subTitle: Think, solve problems, build
favorites_quote: “I'm not a great programmer; I'm just a good programmer with great habits.”
bio_desc: I’m well known as Maaz, I am a Self-Taught Web & Mobile developer based in Nigeria (West Africa). I Am passionate programmer who love to build useful software an solve technical problems with my skills.  I also possess excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and a commitment to meeting deadlines. I am a quick learner and always eager to expand my skillset to take on new challenges and improve my abilities
